trans-unit.source: Contains information about an area of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control or a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações sobre uma área de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo ou um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ListViewHitTestInfo is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> class when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: ListViewHitTestInfo é devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>classe quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> at the position indicated by a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> na posição indicada por um acessos testar um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This value will be `null` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> does not contain items or the position indicated is not on an item.
trans-unit.target: Este valor será `null` se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>não contém itens ou a posição indicada não é um item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> at the position indicated by a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> na posição indicada por um acessos testar um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control, in relation to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> and the items it contains.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a localização de um teste de acessos <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo, em relação ao <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> e os itens nele contidos.

trans-unit.source: This property will return <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestLocations> if the hit test indicates a position that is within the client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> but is not located on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade irá devolver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestLocations>se o teste de acessos indica uma posição que é a área de cliente do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, mas não se encontra num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestLocations>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> at the position indicated by a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>na posição indicada por um acessos testar um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: This value will be `null` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> does not contain subitems or the position indicated is not on a subitem.
trans-unit.target: Este valor será `null` se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>não contém subitems ou a posição indicada não é um subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> at the position indicated by a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>na posição indicada por um acessos testar um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>
